nodes.excerpt: We have created a motivating way for people to mix exercise and fun. It is a library of augmented reality games: Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, and Brick Breaker AR. Do pushups to play the games. Go play at playar.ai and earn your spot on the leaderboard!
nodes.title: PlayAR - Augmented reality games to get you moving
nodes.author: Anika Mehrotra

localize.description: 我们为人们创造了一种将运动和乐趣相结合的激励方式。这是一个增强现实游戏库。Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, 和Brick Breaker AR. 做俯卧撑去玩游戏。去playar.ai玩吧，在排行榜上赢得你的位置!
localize.tagline: 增强现实游戏让你动起来

localize.description: 我們爲人們創造了一種將運動和樂趣相結合的激勵方式。這是一個增強現實遊戲庫。Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, 和Brick Breaker AR. 做俯臥撐去玩遊戲。去playar.ai玩吧，在排行榜上贏得你的位置!
localize.tagline: 增強現實遊戲讓你動起來

nodes.excerpt: Kbee transforms Google Drive folders into a searchable wiki for you, your team, or your customers.

nodes.excerpt: Focus on what matters, from small tasks to life goals: - Spend your time doing things and reaching your goals - Stop wasting your time classifying things or measuring productivity. Minimalist and delightful design. No sign up. No ads. No data collected.
nodes.title: Listed - The minimalist app for your to-dos & notes
nodes.author: François Goldgewicht

localize.description: 专注于重要的事情，从小任务到人生目标。- 把时间花在做事情和实现目标上 不要再浪费时间去分类或衡量生产力了 简约而愉悦的设计。无需注册。没有广告。不收集数据。
localize.tagline: 为你的待办事项和笔记而设计的极简主义应用。

localize.description: 專注於重要的事情，從小任務到人生目標。- 把時間花在做事情和實現目標上 不要再浪費時間去分類或衡量生產力了 簡約而愉悅的設計。無需註冊。沒有廣告。不收集數據。
localize.tagline: 爲你的待辦事項和筆記而設計的極簡主義應用。

nodes.excerpt: A comprehensive tool for ensuring that Applicant Tracking Systems (ATSs) and other automatic filtering systems can accurately read you CV and extract text from it. Your CV will only progress to a human reviewer if a machine can read it properly.
nodes.title: e-Read My CV - Test if machine can parse your CV and read its content
nodes.author: Vlad  Grossman

localize.description: 一个全面的工具，确保申请人跟踪系统(ATS)和其他自动过滤系统能够准确地阅读你的简历并从中提取文本。只有当机器能够正确阅读您的简历时，您的简历才会提交给人工审核员。
localize.tagline: 测试机器是否能解析你的简历并读取其内容。

localize.description: 一個全面的工具，確保申請人跟蹤系統(ATS)和其他自動過濾系統能夠準確地閱讀你的簡歷並從中提取文本。只有當機器能夠正確閱讀您的簡歷時，您的簡歷纔會提交給人工審覈員。
localize.tagline: 測試機器是否能解析你的簡歷並讀取其內容。

nodes.excerpt: Drink Map is a small app that helps you log the places in which you have drunk. By pressing the only real button available, "Raise the jug", you'll mark your location. Learn a new fact every time you use the app on the DID YOU KNOW? section!
nodes.title: Drink Map - Mark places where you have drunk
nodes.author: Unai Sanchez

localize.description: 饮酒地图是一款能帮你记录喝酒的地方的小程序。按下唯一一个真实的按钮 "举杯"，你就会标记你的位置。在DID YOU KNOW栏目中，每次使用该应用都能了解到一个新的事实!
localize.tagline: 记下你喝过酒的地方

localize.description: 飲酒地圖是一款能幫你記錄喝酒的地方的小程序。按下唯一一個真實的按鈕 "舉杯"，你就會標記你的位置。在DID YOU KNOW欄目中，每次使用該應用都能瞭解到一個新的事實!
localize.tagline: 記下你喝過酒的地方

nodes.excerpt: Keka wants to be an easy to use little app, well integrated in macOS and very powerful. And it is. You can compress files in all common (and not that common) formats and uncompress almost every format file, with and without encryption.
nodes.title: Keka - The macOS file archiver
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Keka希望成为一个易于使用的小程序，很好地集成在macOS中，并且非常强大。而它也确实如此。你可以压缩所有常见（和不常见）格式的文件，并解压几乎所有格式的文件，有加密和不加密。
localize.tagline: macOS文件归档器

localize.description: Keka希望成爲一個易於使用的小程序，很好地集成在macOS中，並且非常強大。而它也確實如此。你可以壓縮所有常見（和不常見）格式的文件，並解壓幾乎所有格式的文件，有加密和不加密。
localize.tagline: macOS文件歸檔器

nodes.excerpt: HelloScribe Guru can write a draft on just about any topic - in seconds. Automated writing for long-form content has never been faster, easier, or more convenient. Get off the blank page - say bye-bye writer's block!
nodes.title: HelloScribe Guru - Your AI-powered article writer - for real.
nodes.author: George Prendergast

localize.description: HelloScribe Guru可以在几秒钟内写出关于任何主题的草稿。自动写作的长篇内容从来没有更快，更容易，或更方便。脱离空白页--告别作家的块垒
localize.tagline: 你的AI-powered article writer--是真的。

localize.description: HelloScribe Guru可以在幾秒鐘內寫出關於任何主題的草稿。自動寫作的長篇內容從來沒有更快，更容易，或更方便。脫離空白頁--告別作家的塊壘
localize.tagline: 你的AI-powered article writer--是真的。

nodes.excerpt: Beam makes it easy to get paid to text your biggest fans. Send premium paid content, images, or videos directly to your monthly paying subscribers.
nodes.title: Beam - Get paid to delight your followers via text
nodes.author: Justin Mitchell

localize.description: Beam让您轻松获得报酬，向您的忠实粉丝发送短信。直接向您的月度付费用户发送高级付费内容、图片或视频。

nodes.excerpt: B2B buyers are tired of the traditional sales process and want a B2C like buying experience. Deal Rooms transform your sales process to sell B2B buyers how they want to be sold. Open to close, deal rooms help your sales teams sell more and sell fast.
nodes.title: Referenceable - Deal rooms create B2C like buying experiences for B2B buyers
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: B2B买家已经厌倦了传统的销售流程，他们希望获得类似B2C的购买体验。Deal Rooms将改变您的销售流程，以B2B买家想要的方式进行销售。从开放到关闭，交易室帮助您的销售团队卖得更多，卖得更快。
localize.tagline: 交易室为B2B买家创造类似B2C的购买体验

localize.description: B2B買家已經厭倦了傳統的銷售流程，他們希望獲得類似B2C的購買體驗。Deal Rooms將改變您的銷售流程，以B2B買家想要的方式進行銷售。從開放到關閉，交易室幫助您的銷售團隊賣得更多，賣得更快。
localize.tagline: 交易室爲B2B買家創造類似B2C的購買體驗

nodes.excerpt: Eco puts your money back to work for you. It's a single balance that lets you spend, send, save and make money at the same time. Earn 2.5-5% on your balance, plus get 5% cashback at merchants. And, soon, pay bills and send money to friends for more rewards.

nodes.author: Andy Bromberg

localize.description: Eco让你的钱重新为你工作。它是一个单一的余额，让你消费，发送，储蓄和赚钱在同一时间。赚取2.5-5%的余额，并在商家获得5%的现金回馈。而且，很快就可以支付账单和寄钱给朋友，获得更多奖励。
localize.tagline: 储蓄、消费、赚钱的一个简单平衡。

localize.description: Eco讓你的錢重新爲你工作。它是一個單一的餘額，讓你消費，發送，儲蓄和賺錢在同一時間。賺取2.5-5%的餘額，並在商家獲得5%的現金回饋。而且，很快就可以支付賬單和寄錢給朋友，獲得更多獎勵。
localize.tagline: 儲蓄、消費、賺錢的一個簡單平衡。

nodes.excerpt: WellBuddy is a smart wellbeing tool that makes it easy and simple to focus on your health at work. ⠀ It integrates with your calendar and monitors and schedules physical and mental health breaks when you’re free so you can think, feel and perform better.

nodes.excerpt: Planning a Clubhouse meetup soon? Then you need to invite to your room as many people as possible. Let’s do it via social media: Twitter, Telegram, and Instagram. Put your content on the main artboard and get cards for all three platforms at once.
nodes.title: Clubhouse Cards - Announce your next meetup to as many people as possible

localize.tagline: 向尽可能多的人宣布你的下一次见面会。

nodes.excerpt: Over 20% of females struggle with a hormone-related issue such as PCOS, endometriosis, or amenorrhea. Pollie is your friend at every step of your hormonal health journey, from finding your best-fit specialist to symptom tracking.
nodes.title: Pollie - Hormonal health, simplified
nodes.author: Jane Sagui

localize.description: 20% 以上的女性都在为荷尔蒙相关的问题而烦恼，如 PCOS、子宫内膜异位症或闭经。在您的荷尔蒙健康之旅的每一步，从寻找最适合您的专家到症状跟踪，Pollie都是您的朋友。
localize.tagline: 荷尔蒙健康，简化

nodes.excerpt: Allfactor is the leading market analytics platform that provides data-driven solutions for ecommerce brands to thrive in the industry. The tools enable sellers to optimize product offering, track performance, and conduct competitive analysis across platforms.

nodes.excerpt: This app is used for writing copy for marketing purposes, such as website content or blog posts. This copy can be customized and unique to each client and can be used immediately on your website. The app uses artificial intelligence (AI) to write amazing copy.
nodes.title: Exty Solutions - AI copywriting that writes everything for you within a click
nodes.author: Ian Dikhtiar

localize.description: 这个应用程序用于编写营销目的的文案，如网站内容或博客文章。这些文案可以为每个客户定制和独特的，并可以立即在您的网站上使用。该应用程序使用人工智能（AI）来编写惊人的文案。
localize.tagline: AI文案，一键就能为你写出一切。

localize.description: 這個應用程序用於編寫營銷目的的文案，如網站內容或博客文章。這些文案可以爲每個客戶定製和獨特的，並可以立即在您的網站上使用。該應用程序使用人工智能（AI）來編寫驚人的文案。
localize.tagline: AI文案，一鍵就能爲你寫出一切。
